name: Astra Fat Spread
description: Astra is a much loved breakfast fat spread in Sri Lanka for kids which is also the trusted and must have ingredient for Spreading, Topping, Baking and Cooking that adds not only flavour but also the goodness and nutrition of Vitamin A and Vitamin D to the meal. Astra 1kg can be used for multiple purposes, Best used for Baking.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
